pullRequest.title: Handle properly indexing rectangles that crosses the dateline
pullRequest.bodyText: When indexing a rectangle that crosses the dateline, we are currently not handling it properly and we index a polygon that do not cross the dateline. This changes generates two polygons wrapping the dateline.

commit.message: Handle properly indexing rectangles that crosses the dateline
